attributes.action: give life inprisonment to baby p killers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not right that these monsters should only be giving 14 years as a punishment for there brutal attack to that small frightened child, GORDON BROWN, our voice, think if it was your own child, you have to  make a change,these monsters think they can get away with it this can never happen again, please change the law against protecting the guilty protect the children who cant speak, please hear there cries, please dont let baby p's death in vane.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
